EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_SpringOne Tour_PARENT_2019.Warsaw Cancellation
EmailTemplate.subject: SpringOne Tour Warsaw Cancellation
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello,
Thank you for your expressed interest in attending SpringOne Tour Warsaw.
We regret to inform you that we have cancelled our Warsaw event due to a scheduling conflict. If you are still interested in attending SpringOne Tour, please see the other European locations and dates on the website <[[https://springonetour.io]]>.
If you have any other questions, please feel free to email SpringOneTour@pivotal.io <[[mailto:SpringOneTour@pivotal.io]]>.
Thank you for understanding, Tasha Isenberg and the SpringOne Tour Team
